description.narrative: Funding under this initiative provides support the OECD Asia Pacific Senior Budget Official's Network: an on-going, regional initiative that brings together the budget directors and other senior officials from the region in an annual meeting to discuss common issues and interests. The objective of the network is to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of public expenditures in the region and to incorporate amongst delegates and officials budgeting as a critical instrument for promoting good governance and economic and social development. The total value of this initiative is $0.3 million over 9 years, starting 2008-09.
